short_summary: Amélioration de la serre du Centre de foresterie du Pacifique, Victoria (C.-B.)
description: Cette phase 2 est un appel d'offres suite à une invitation à se qualifier. Les sous-resultats de lutte ont-ils été acceptés du boulanger, sujet à des subventions
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Pacific Forestry Centre Greenhouse Upgrade

#### Invitation to Bid: Invitation to Qualify
##### Contract Information

*   **Contract Title (English)**: Pacific Forestry Centre Greenhouse Upgrade, Phase 2
*   **Contract Title (French)**: Amélioration de la serre du Centre de foresterie du Pacifique, phase 2
*   **Contract Reference Number**: WS4087614237
*   **Corrigendum Number**: 5
*   **Invitation to Bid (Request for Proposal) Number**: WS4087614237
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-08-01
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2023-08-29, 14:00:00
*   **Corrigendum Date**: 2023-08-25

##### Contract Details
*   **Contract Category**: Nonresidential Building Construction Services
*   **Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**: Contracting Authority
*   **Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)**: End User

#### Contract Description

The Phase 2 solicitation follows an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal.

#### Tendering Method

The tendering method for this contract is selective tendering with the lowest price as the selection criteria.

#### Trade Agreements

The contract may be subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

#### Contract Location and Delivery

*   Contract Location: British Columbia, Canada, Victoria
*   Delivery: The contractor shall deliver the goods at the designated site.

#### Contact Information

*   **Name**: Ngan, Ken (SPAC/PSPC) (they/them)
*   **Email**: ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Note**: For inquiries related to this contract, please contact the contracting authority.  



;
